## Source: ossf-package-analysis (c235c19b294f6525db099362bcd84e2b942e0f9d54a448042f7f81e692cd4e14)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'shadowkw' @ 912.6 (pypi) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.
